divs: sighting detailswas coming home from the store. looked up in the sky and saw what i thought may be an airplane \ helicopter, but it was a bright orange orb flying in the sky. similar in elevation as an airplane, but with no noise. was like light a bright sphere of light that did not blink. orange in color unlike the blue\red or white-yellow lights on most aircraft.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Berkley
There were no other sightings in Berkley on or around July 2nd 2012
